segments.mental_focus: Start easy, settle into a rhythm
segments.extra_info: The race begins in Hyde Park, offering scenic views of the Serpentine Lake. Avoid an early adrenaline rush; focus on finding your pace.

segments.mental_focus: Focus on breathing and staying relaxed
segments.extra_info: Proceed towards The Green Park, passing Wellington Arch. Check form and cadence as you enjoy the tree-lined paths.
Enter St James's Park, with views of Buckingham Palace. Drink water if needed and appreciate the park's beauty.

segments.mental_focus: Stay focused and consistent. Concrentrate on your pace - stick to the plan
segments.extra_info: Run along Horse Guards Road, passing the Horse Guards Parade. Avoid overthinking the distance; stay present.
Re-enter The Green Park, heading towards Hyde Park Corner. Take nutrition if needed and maintain good posture.

segments.mental_focus: Stay relaxed, keep breathing steady. Start counting your steps if things get tricky
segments.extra_info: Move back into Hyde Park, enjoying the open spaces. Check energy levels and adjust pace if necessary.
Pass by the Diana Memorial Fountain. Hydrate at the next station and stick to your race strategy.

segments.mental_focus: Start preparing mentally for the finish
segments.extra_info: Head towards Kensington Gardens, with sights of Kensington Palace. Visualise finishing strong as you slightly increase effort.
Navigate the paths of Kensington Gardens. Take one mile at a time, focusing on your rhythm.
Return to Hyde Park, approaching the final stages. Keep a positive mindset and push through any fatigue.

segments.mental_focus: Push hard, focus on the finish
segments.extra_info: Circle the Serpentine Lake one last time. This is the final stretch; give it your all.
Approach the finish line near Hyde Park Corner. Enjoy the moment and celebrate your achievement!
